descriptionHtml:
I've seen that Lydia becomes a little weak when we get strong, this is because she doesn't level up like we do, so I've created this mod mainly for this, but later decided that a change in her appearance would do just fine, so this mod contains:

Level-up system:
She will always have the level as the hero.

Perk System:
She is mainly a defender, so her shield and heavy armor perks will be her mainly perks.

Appearance:
Look at the images!

Essential NPC:
She'll not die anymore, will just go to the ground and stay there for a moment.


Installation:
Install this via NMM or put the contents on your Data folder.


If you like, endorse, if don't, just pass in silence, but all the critics will be pondered, they're necessary to a greater work.

Anyone that is willing to have another NPCs remodeled, just PM me, I'll be happy to help where I could.
